nautilus is your desktop
It is a file browser. Your desktop is just a nautilus window without a window border.
but if i only have the desktop open (and no other Nautilus windows) it doesn't show up in top.
There are more things running then top shows. Try ps -e
or ps -ex is you want to be overwheled with data ;)
but isn't it the same for you too?... that if you don't have any other Nautilus windows open, aside from desktop, it shouldn't show up in top or ps -e /ps -ex.
no, it's showing as running for me. run 'ps -e | grep nautilus' to see
i see.
